channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: URGENT! Dangerous potholes. Bicycle crashed down potholes in the dark this morning and wheel was damaged and tyre punctured and cyclist thrown. These potholes have been reported but not fixed. Please deal with this urgently before more damage and injuries occur., 7th February
item.description:
URGENT! Dangerous potholes. Bicycle crashed down potholes in the dark this morning and wheel was damaged and tyre punctured and cyclist thrown. These potholes have been reported but not fixed. Please deal with this urgently before more damage and injuries occur.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Street, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ladders Arnold est bin area by Marquis of wellington, 7th February
item.description:
Someone storing ladders behind bin area, left for several months. Not a storage area. New no fly tipping signs. Please remove as not a storage area and is hazardous to public health.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sweeney Crescent, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: Trees from neighbouring streets dumping waste, 7th February
item.description:
The garages in Silver Spring Close back on to gardens in Riverdale Road. In photos you can clearly see that they have cut their garden trees down and dumped the remaining branches over the wall into our garages area. This has been an issue for last 2 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Silver Spring Close, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
